item.title: Shovel Knight Dig PS5 and Switch physical edition announced
item.content:encoded:
• PS5
  • Switch

Available on January 8.

Super Rare Games will distribute a physical edition of Yacht Club Games and Nitrome-developed roguelite game Shovel Knight Dig for PlayStation 5 and Switch, the company announced.

The game will be available to order via Super Rare Games on January 8 at 10:00 a.m. PT / 1:00 p.m. ET. Only 2,500 PlayStation 5 and 4,000 Switch standard edition units will be available.

Shovel Knight is currently available digitally for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Xbox One, Switch, PC via Steam, and Apple Arcade.



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/01/shovel-knight-dig-ps5-and-switch-physical-edition-announced
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot

item.title: Hi-Fi RUSH physical edition pre-orders open January 16
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Available in Rhythm, Smidge, and Armstrong editions.

Pre-orders for the long-awaited physical edition of Hi-Fi RUSH will go live via Limited Run Games from January 16 to March 1, the distributor announced.

The physical release will be available in the following three editions:

Rhythm Edition ($39.99)

  • Hi-Fi RUSH Deluxe Edition
  • Three downloadable content costume packs
    • Bossplay
    • Traditional Garb
    • Templay

Smidge Edition ($69.99)

  • Hi-Fi RUSH Deluxe Edition
  • Three downloadable content costume pack
    • Bossplay
    • Traditional Garb
    • Templay
  • Three-disc soundtrack, including liner notes

Armstrong Edition ($174.99)

  • Hi-Fi RUSH Deluxe Edition
  • Three downloadable content costume pack
    • Bossplay
    • Traditional Garb
    • Templay
  • Three-disc soundtrack, including liner notes
  • Hardcover art book
  • Eight-inch 808 plush
  • Six-inch Chai’s guitar replica
  • Chai’s Project Armstrong pass
  • Jumbo glow in the dark spinning MP3 player pin
  • Individually numbered certificate of authenticity

Hi-Fi RUSH is available now digitally for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam, Epic Games Store, and Microsoft Store.



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/01/hi-fi-rush-physical-edition-pre-orders-open-january-16
